select t1.id, t1.title, t1.issueQuestionType, DATE_FORMAT(t1.complainDate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') complainDate, DATE_FORMAT(t1.replyDate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') replyDate, t1.replyStatus from jacg_issuereport t1 where del='0'
and t1.issueQuestionType like concat('%', #{issueQuestionType}, '%')
